title: 1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Adviser (Minister
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Adviser (Minister
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Adviser (Minister 

of State at the Department of Health) Order 2025.
text_norm: 1 order may cited appointment special adviser (minister state department health) order 2025

title: 1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Adviser (Minister
heading: 2. Briege Mac Oscar, particulars of whose address have been deposited at
text_raw:
2. Briege Mac Oscar, particulars of whose address have been deposited at 
the offices of the Department of Health, is appointed to be a Special Adviser to 
Jennifer Murnane O’Connor, Minister of State at the Department of Health, with 
effect from 31 March 2025. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

4 June, 2025. 

MICHEÁL MARTIN, 

Taoiseach. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 6th June, 2025. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [254] 3

title: 1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Adviser (Minister
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

The purpose of this Order is to appoint a Special to Minister Murnane O’Connor, 
Minister of State at the Department of Health. 

 
 
 
 
 
 4 [254]
